name: French Silk Chocolate Pie
author: Pillsbury
summary: Replacing the raw eggs in this recipe with pasteurized eggs or fat-free egg product eliminates food safety concerns and allows you to enjoy this Bake-Off® Contest favorite.
ingredients: 1  Pillsbury® refrigerated pie crust, softened as directed on box
3 (1 ounce) squares Hershey®'s unsweetened chocolate, cut into pieces
1 cup LAND O LAKES® butter, softened (do not use margarine)
4  large eggs pasteurized eggs or equivalent fat-free cholesterol-free egg product
directions: Make pie crust as directed on box for One-Crust Baked Shell using 9-inch glass pie pan
Bake 9 to 11 minutes or until light golden brown
In 1-quart saucepan, melt chocolate over low heat; cool
In small bowl with electric mixer, beat butter on medium speed until fluffy
Gradually beat in sugar until light and fluffy
Beat in cooled chocolate and vanilla until well blended
Add eggs 1 at a time, beating on high speed 2 minutes after each addition; beat until mixture is smooth and fluffy
Refrigerate at least 2 hours before serving
Garnish with whipped cream and chocolate curls
